I posted this listing in the wrong section before, so just putting it here where it belongs. My apologies to the group.

I know this card is tough. It's the last one I need for my T207 Highlanders team set. I'm looking for a low grade example in my budget. I have a Tango Eggs Hal Chase, SGC 10 I can offer in a trade. Thanks!

Mike
